PluginData.Author: DogBoy
PluginData.Tooltip: Customizable ships sounds, makes your ship alive!
PluginData.Description: Adds authentic engine sounds that dynamically respond to your ships speed, maneuvering, startup, hull ambiences and more, providing an immersive GaMInG experience. Choose from a diverse selection of engine addons and switch between them on the move. To add more engines, simply subscribe to SEENG addons via the steam workshop and reload the game. Access menu by typing /seeng. *Works on the servers aswell.
